about_the_game:
Bonus Content for Sphere: Flying Cities | Safe the World Edition

Ascend to greater heights with the Sphere - Flying Cities | Save the World Edition and bling out your city with the exclusive Save the World Skin for five buildings like the indispensable Anti Gravity Device. But that's not all: Take a deep-dive into the fascinating architecture of Sphere - Flying Cities with the offical Sphere-Mini-Artbook!

This Premium Edition is a great way to show appreciation for the developers, while simultaneously supporting a good cause. Assemble Entertainment will donate 10% of the proceeds for every sold Save the World Edition to Atmosfair, an environmental development organization that focuses on clean energy climate protection projects.

The Save the World Edition contains Sphere – Flying Cities, the official Mini-Artbook and the exclusive Save the World Skin for these five buildings:

  • Anti Gravity Device
  • Community Kitchen
  • Technology Center
  • Small Park
  • Healthcare Center

Join us in our effort and contribute your share to save the world!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon R7 370 (or equivalent), 2 GB video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 970, Radeon RX 580 (or equivalent), 4GB video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
